body.name: Citrus Magic Holiday Odor Absorbing Solid Air Freshener, Winter Wonder Green, 7-Ounce, Pack of 3
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 13 hrs 44 mins
features: ALL MAGIC, NO TRICKS: Experience the magical fragrance of the forest with our refreshing blend of cedar, balsam, winter berries, and icy citrus with this holiday air freshener that eliminates foul odors and fills the air with freshness.

SAFE INGREDIENTS: This odor eliminator comes with a unique odor-eliminating formula without harsh chemicals like parabens, phthalates, formaldehyde, and more; Relish the freshness minus the harshness!

ELIMINATE FOUL SMELL: These air fresheners for home, office, and more are ideal for any place that should smell fresh or target spots such as bathrooms, basements, closets, and more that need constant odor-control.

WITH ODOR-ELIMINATOR FORMULA: This air freshener absorbs troublesome malodors for a cleaner and fresher air; The pleasant scent of the forest takes over every foul odor to make the room drench in freshness.

ODOR CONTROL FOR UP TO 8 WEEKS: This easy-to-use air freshener replenishes the air with a scent of freshness for up to 8 weeks; Remove the label, set it, and the essence of freshness will fill the room.
body.description: Make your holidays special with our Home For The Holidays fragrances. They last the whole season so that you can make new, fun-filled memories without any unpleasantness. Peel the label and set the odor eliminator in a room, and make it smell like divinity! Fill the air with the magical freshness and pleasant scent of the forest with these magic air fresheners and bring every nook and cranny of your home to life. With our 100% active ingredients, you are getting an air freshener that comes with an odor-eliminating formula to absorb the foul smell and replace it with a refreshing blend of cedar, balsam, winter berries, and icy citrus. Our products are safe when used as directed and free from harsh chemicals like parabens, formaldehyde, phthalates, benzene, and more. We are proud to say they are cruelty-free. Find your favorite scent to express yourself and your personality in the spaces you love! Some call it science. We call it magic.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Citrus Magic Citrus Magic has worked to produce safe, naturally based products, free from harsh chemicals, that effectively work at eliminating odors, freshening the air and maintaining a clean environment at home, at work, or even during travel. Furthermore, our products are made to be Prop 65, VOC, and CARB compliant. Citrus Magic strives to maintain the highest level of natural possible while still creating effective, and great smelling, products for your home. Experience the Magic! Citrus Magic Holiday Solid Air Freshener Winter Wonder Green Citrus Magic Air Fresheners eliminate odors by absorbing troublesome odors for cleaner fresher air and long-lasting odor relief. Made with an essence of cedar, balsam, winter berries, and icy citrus to fill the room with freshness. A soothing fragrance that brings you closer to nature and away from all the foul smells. Enhance your senses and enjoy an aroma that makes you feel refreshed. Replenish the air with magical fragrance and eliminate unwanted odors Super-Effective & Long-Lasting Fragrance Gives your home a fresh and new feel Works Like Magic A blend of safe and chemical-free ingredients

Winter Wonder Green Experience a mesmerizing forest-like aroma with a medley of cedar, balsam, winter berries, and icy citrus. Easy-to-Use Just remove the label, set it, and forget it in troublesome areas for up to 8 weeks. Long-Lasting Fragrance No complex chemicals that no one pronounces. Just the power of pure and potent icy citrus.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Very little fragrance
reviews.reviewText: Purchased 2 packs of these for closets and vehicle. Not enough fragrance to bother with. Very weak and did not do as expected

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Couple of years ago I bought this exact product. The scent lasted from the day I bought it in December and lasted till late June. I used it in my trunk where I keep my daily journey books. I bought this expecting the same level of quality. The scent is FAR fainter than it used to be but still running good. Though, the one in use dried out quite quickly even if it is giving a faint smell

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Smells like disinfectant
reviews.reviewText: I was hoping for a nice holiday pine scent but it smells more like disinfectant. I’ll keep them but put them in the bathrooms and near the cat box. I don’t recommend for general use in other rooms unless you want to smell like a hospital

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars that it arrived nin time
reviews.reviewText: this one is totally great the smell and especially if you have animals fantastic this mt second go around thanks

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2022
Reviewed in the United States on March 10, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic Odor Eaters!
reviews.reviewText: We have a chronic rodent-odor problem in a little log cabin on our property, due to some errors when refurbishing that can't be undone without considerable time and expense to redo. So, we need to mask that odor all the time. These little gems are fantastic for that purpose and the evergreen scent is perfect for the mountain environment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This stuff smells like crap...but that is after I put close to heater. Will never buy this.
